name: EassonScratch
script:
library(picante)
se<-function(x) sqrt(var(x)/length(x)) 
rownames(comm) <- comm[,1]
comm <- comm[,-1]
rownames(metadata) <- metadata[,1]
# compare species richness among host species
richness.comm <- specnumber(comm)
#par(mar=c(12,5,1,1)+0.5)
#boxplot(specnumber(comm) ~ metadata$Species, xlab = "", ylab = "# of OTUs", las=2)
rich.comm <- as.matrix(specnumber(comm))
rich.mean<- aggregate(rich.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=mean)
rich.se <- aggregate(rich.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=se)
# statistical test of difference
richness.aov <- aov(specnumber(comm) ~ Species, data = metadata)
# compare Shannon diversity among host species
diversity.comm <- diversity(comm, index = "shannon")
#pdf('Host.Species.Shannon.pdf')
#par(mar=c(12,5,1,1)+0.5)
#boxplot(diversity.comm ~ metadata$Species, xlab = "", ylab = "Shannon-Weaver Index", las=2)
#dev.off()
shannon.comm <- as.matrix(diversity.comm)
shannon.mean<- aggregate(diversity.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=mean)
shannon.se <- aggregate(diversity.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=se)
# statistical test of difference
shannon.aov <- aov(diversity.comm ~ Species, data = metadata)
# compare species Simpson diversity between host species
invsimpson.comm <- diversity(comm, index = "invsimpson")
#pdf('Host.Species.InvSimpson.pdf')
#par(mar=c(12,5,1,1)+0.5)
#boxplot(invsimpson.comm ~ metadata$Species, xlab = "", ylab = "InvSimpson Index", las=2)
#dev.off()
invsimpson.comm <- as.matrix(invsimpson.comm)
invsimpson.mean<- aggregate(invsimpson.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=mean)
invsimpson.se <- aggregate(invsimpson.comm, by=list(metadata$Species), FUN=se)
invsimpson.aov <- aov(invsimpson.comm ~ Species, data = metadata)
aov_out <- list(cbind(metric="richness",factor=rownames(summary(richness.aov)[[1]]), as.data.frame(summary(richness.aov)[[1]])),
    cbind(metric="shannon", factor=rownames(summary(shannon.aov)[[1]]), as.data.frame(summary(shannon.aov)[[1]])),
    cbind(metric="invsimpson",  factor=rownames(summary(invsimpson.aov)[[1]]), as.data.frame(summary(invsimpson.aov)[[1]])))
      
aov_out <- do.call(rbind,aov_out)
rownames(aov_out) <- NULL
# Make Summary table of Diversity indicies
diversity_summary <- cbind(rich.mean, rich.se$V1, shannon.mean$x, shannon.se$x, invsimpson.mean$V1, invsimpson.se$V1)
names(diversity_summary) <- c("Species", "Mean.Richness", "se.Richness", "Mean.Shannon", "se.Shannon", "Mean.InvSimpson", "se.InvSimpson")


comms <- list(richness=rich.comm, shannon=diversity.comm, invsimpson=invsimpson.comm)
tmp <- lapply(1:length(comms), function(x) data.frame(comms[[x]], names(comms)[x], metadata$Species))
communities <- do.call(rbind, tmp)

colnames(communities) <- c("mean_diversity", "metric", "host_species")
communities$specimenID <- rownames(communities)
raw_communities <- communities[,c(4,1:3)]
raw_communities_fig <- communities[,c(4,1:3)]
